title: Ep - 107 - WATCH WHAT HAPPENS LIVE BEHIND THE SCENES
description:
Watch What Happens Live producers John Jude and Melissa France talk about behind the scenes of Bravo’s late night show including best and worst guests, how bartenders are chosen, and what happens when Sonja Morgan visits. 


Kate Kennedy reviews the premier episode of TLC’s 90 Day Fiance: Happily Ever After. 


Alzie Sisco reviews the season finale of Survivor: Ghost island. 


Carlene and Steve Stauff give their assessment of Bachelor alums Ashley and Jared producing a 45-minute video about their new relationship. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
